Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial

Class DynamicTutorial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.DynamicTutorial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, androidx.viewpager.widget.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, Tutorial<DynamicTutorial,​DynamicTutorialFragment>, Tutorial.Motion<DynamicTutorial,​DynamicTutorialFragment>
    public class DynamicTutorial
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parcelable, Tutorial.Motion<DynamicTutorial,​DynamicTutorialFragment>
    A Tutorial item to display a title, subtitle and description along with an image which can be tinted according to the tutorial colors.
